SELECT level2 FROM ai_detection
AND label_id = #{labelId}
select name, luggage_id, reg_date from adex_images where reg_date between date(now()) and date(now())+1 group by luggage_id order by reg_date desc limit 1
select * from adex_images where name = #{name} limit 1

select (select count(*) from xray_analyze_statistics A join ai_detection B on A.detection_id = B.label_id where B.level2 is not null and A.reg_date between date(now()) and date(now())+1) as detectionCount, count(*) as luggageCount from (select luggage_code from luggage where reg_date between date(now()) and date(now())+1) as luggageCount
select name from adex_images where luggage_id = (select luggage_id from adex_images order by reg_date desc limit 1) and reg_date between date(now()) and date(now())+1 limit 9

select B.level2 as label_name, count(*) as label_count from xray_analyze_statistics A join ai_detection B on A.detection_id = B.label_id where B.level2 is not null and A.reg_date between date(now()) and date(now())+1 group by B.level2 order by label_count desc
select name,luggage_id,reg_date from adex_images where reg_date between date(now()) and date(now())+1 group by luggage_id order by reg_date desc LIMIT #{pageSize} OFFSET #{offset}
